languages.text: {n}Старый слуга бросает на вас цепкий, оценивающий взгляд.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, чем могу быть полезен?"
{n}The old servant casts a sharp, appraising glance at you.{/n} "How can I be of use to Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship?"
languages.original_text: {n}Старый слуга бросает на вас цепкий, оценивающий взгляд.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, чем могу быть полезен?"

languages.text: {n}老仆以犀利的目光打量着你。{/n}“我该如何为您效劳呢，大人？”
languages.original_text: {n}The old servant casts a sharp, appraising glance at you.{/n} "How can I be of use to Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}老仆以犀利的目光打量着你。{/n}“我该如何为您效劳呢，大人？”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}老いぼれた召使は、鋭い視線をあなたに投げかけた。{/n}「陛下、どのようなご用件でしょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The old servant casts a sharp, appraising glance at you.{/n} "How can I be of use to Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}老いぼれた召使は、鋭い視線をあなたに投げかけた。{/n}「陛下、どのようなご用件でしょうか？」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}El viejo sirviente te lanza una mirada penetrante.{/n} «¿Cómo puedo servirle, mi{mf|lord|lady}?».
languages.original_text: {n}The old servant casts a sharp, appraising glance at you.{/n} "How can I be of use to Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El viejo sirviente te lanza una mirada penetrante.{/n} «¿Cómo puedo servirle, mi{mf|lord|lady}?».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Der alte Diener wirf dir einen scharfen, prüfenden Blick zu.{/n} "Wie kann ich Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} behilflich sein?"
languages.original_text: {n}The old servant casts a sharp, appraising glance at you.{/n} "How can I be of use to Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Diener wirf dir einen scharfen, prüfenden Blick zu.{/n} "Wie kann ich Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} behilflich sein?"
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Le vieux serviteur vous jauge d'un regard perçant.{/n} « Que puis-je faire pour vous, Votre Seigneurie ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The old servant casts a sharp, appraising glance at you.{/n} "How can I be of use to Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieux serviteur vous jauge d'un regard perçant.{/n} « Que puis-je faire pour vous, Votre Seigneurie ? »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı hizmetkâr sana çabuk, seni ölçen bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne nasıl yardımcı olabilirim?"
languages.original_text: {n}The old servant casts a sharp, appraising glance at you.{/n} "How can I be of use to Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship?"
